TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider extends System.Web.Security.RoleProvider

summary.span: 管理授權管理員原則存放區中 ASP.NET 應用程式的角色成員資格資訊儲存區，位於 XML 檔案、Active Directory 或 Active Directory 應用程式模式伺服器之中。

span.span: Manages storage of role-membership information for an ASP.NET application in an authorization-manager policy store, either in an XML file, in an Active Directory, or on an Active Directory Application Mode server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類別由和提供 ASP.NET 應用程式使用授權管理員存放的角色管理服務的類別。This class is used by the and classes to provide role-management services for an ASP.NET application using an authorization-manager store. 您可以使用角色管理您的應用程式指定不同的層級的授權。You can use role management to specify different levels of authorization for your application. 授權管理員可以使用 Microsoft Management Console 來存取。The authorization manager can be accessed using the Microsoft Management Console. 物件適用於這兩個 Windows 驗證和表單驗證模式。The object works with both Windows authentication and forms authentication modes. 您可以設定使用本機的 XML 檔案或 Active Directory 或 Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) 的伺服器物件。You can configure the object to use either a local XML file or an Active Directory or Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) server. 使用本機檔案時，連接字串看起來應該如下列範例所示。When using a local file, the connection string should look like the following example. ``` msxml:// ``` 如果本機檔案儲存在 ASP.NET Web 應用程式的目錄樹狀結構中，您可以使用波狀符號 ("~") 字元來表示目錄的根目錄。If the local file is stored in the directory tree of an ASP.NET Web application, you can use the tilde ("~") character to indicate the root directory. 比方說，若要指出，本機的檔案會儲存在 Web 應用程式的資料目錄中，您會使用類似下列的範例連接字串。For example, to indicate that the local file is stored in the Web application's data directory, you would use a connection string similar to the following example. `msxml://~\App_Data\datafilename.xml` > [!IMPORTANT] > 將 XML 資料檔儲存在 Web 應用程式目錄是潛在的安全性威脅。Storing an XML data file in the Web application directory is a potential security threat. 根據預設，IIS 將提供給網站的 XML 資料檔案。By default, IIS will serve XML data files to the Web. 為了提高安全性，當您使用本機資料檔在 ASP.NET 應用程式中的，您應該儲存資料檔案中的`App_Data`目錄。To improve security when using a local data file in an ASP.NET application, you should store the data file in the `App_Data` directory. 檔案儲存在`App_Data`目錄將不會對 Web 服務。Files stored in the `App_Data` directory will not be served to the Web. 如果您使用的 Active Directory 或 ADAM 伺服器的原則存放區，您的連接字串應該類似下列的範例。If you are using an Active Directory or ADAM server for the policy store, your connection string should be similar to the following example. `msldap://myserver/CN=MyAzManStore,OU=MyOU,DC=MyDomain,DC=MyDC,DC=Com` 列出的文件中的例外狀況物件的方法是所引發的例外狀況物件。The exceptions listed in the documentation for object methods are the exceptions that are raised by the object. 提供者依賴基礎的驗證管理員執行階段，因為例外狀況可能是每當擲回物件會轉送驗證管理員執行階段的方法呼叫。Since the provider relies on the underlying Authentication Manager runtime, a exception may be thrown whenever the object forwards a method call to the Authentication Manager runtime. > [!IMPORTANT] > 物件必須在部分信任環境中執行下列需求：The object has the following requirements for running in partial-trust environments: > > 時使用 ASP.NET 應用程式中，目前的信任層級授與檔案 I/O 權限以檔案為基礎的原則存放區來判斷是否允許讀取及寫入動作會由提供者。When using a file-based policy store in an ASP.NET application, the file I/O permissions granted by the current trust level determine whether read and write actions are allowed by the provider. ASP.NET 應用程式必須有讀取檔案的權限，才能讀取原則存放區中的資料，而且必須具有寫入權限，以儲存新的資訊，或更新現有原則存放區中的資訊。The ASP.NET application must have read permission on the file to read data from the policy store, and must have write permission to save new information or update existing information in the policy store. 預設中度信任原則檔案會提供其應用程式目錄中的 ASP.NET 應用程式讀取/寫入權限。The default Medium-trust policy file gives an ASP.NET application read/write permissions in its application directory. 預設值低信任層級原則檔只會提供 ASP.NET 應用程式讀取在其應用程式目錄的權限。The default Low-trust policy file only gives an ASP.NET application read permission in its application directory. 此外，ASP.NET 應用程式執行所在處理序身分識別必須具有讀取和/或寫入的原則檔案的檔案系統權限。In addition, the process identity under which the ASP.NET application runs must have file-system permissions to read and/or write the policy file. > > ASP.NET 應用程式使用 Active Directory 或 ADAM 伺服器時，需要 unmanaged 程式碼權限，因為內部物件程式碼會使用 COM interop。When using an Active Directory or ADAM server, the ASP.NET application needs unmanaged-code permission because the internal object code uses COM interop. > > 當使用物件在 ASP.NET 之外，呼叫程式碼需要 unmanaged 程式碼的權限。When using the object outside of ASP.NET, the calling code needs unmanaged-code permission. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示 Web.config 檔案設定為使用角色管理。The following code example shows a Web.config file set to use the for role management. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呼叫一或多個使用者與授權管理員資料存放區中的 ASP.NET 應用程式組態檔 (Web.config) 中指定的一或多個角色建立關聯的類別。The method is called by the class to associate one or more users with one or more roles in the authorization-manager data store specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 這個方法會呼叫， ， ，以及方法類別。This method is called by the , , , and methods of the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例的角色中加入一個或多個使用者，或從角色移除使用者。The following code example adds one or more users to a role or removes a user from a role. 如需啟用角色管理的 Web.config 檔案的範例，請參閱。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/CS/adduserstorolecs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/VB/adduserstorolevb.aspx#3)]

summary.span: 取得或設定授權存放應用程式的名稱，要為它存放及擷取角色資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the authorization store application for which to store and retrieve role information.

value.span: 要為它存放和擷取角色資訊的授權存放應用程式名稱。

span.span: The name of the authorization store application for which to store and retrieve role information.

value.span: 預設為目前 的 屬性值。

span.span: The default is the property value for the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正由不同授權管理員應用程式，可讓多個 ASP.NET 相關聯的使用者和角色應用程式使用相同的授權管理員原則存放區來儲存不需要的角色資訊重複的角色名稱之間發生衝突。The is used by the to associate users and roles with different authorization-manager applications, which enables multiple ASP.NET applications to use the same authorization-manager policy store to store role information without running into conflicts between duplicate role names. 或者，多個 ASP.NET 應用程式時，可以藉由指定相同的值中使用相同的原則存放區屬性。Alternatively, multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same policy store by specifying the same value in the property. 可以以程式設計方式設定屬性，或者它可以是以宣告方式設定應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中使用`applicationName`屬性。The property can be set programmatically, or it can be set declaratively in the application's Web.config file by using the `applicationName` attribute. 如果未指定值`applicationName`屬性，在 Web.config 檔案中，則目前的屬性值物件使用。If a value is not specified for the `applicationName` attribute in the Web.config file, then the property value for the current object is used. > [!NOTE] > 授權管理員應用程式名稱不可包含"/"字元包含在屬性。Authorization-manager application names cannot contain the "/" character that is included in the property. 如此一來的預設值屬性不能做授權管理員應用程式名稱，並在應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中，您永遠必須指定`applicationName`屬性中`provider`項目來設定您執行個體。As a result, the default value for the property cannot be used as an authorization-manager application name, and in the application's Web.config file, you must always specify an `applicationName` attribute in the `provider` element to configure your instance. > [!CAUTION] > 因為單一的預設角色提供者執行個體用來提供所要求的所有物件，您可以有多個要求同時執行，而且嘗試設定屬性值。Because a single default role provider instance is used for all of the requests served by an object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the property value. 屬性不是執行緒安全的多個寫入與變更屬性值可能會導致非預期的行為時有多個使用者的應用程式。The property is not thread safe for multiple writes, and changing the property value can result in unexpected behavior when there are multiple users of an application. 我們建議您避免撰寫程式碼，可讓使用者設定屬性除非必要，否則。We recommend that you avoid writing code that allows users to set the property unless you must. 應用程式的範例設定屬性可能需要管理多個應用程式的角色資料的系統管理應用程式。An example of an application where setting the property may be required is an administrative application that manages role data for multiple applications. 這類應用程式應該是單一使用者應用程式並不是 Web 應用程式。Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application. ## Examples 下列範例示範中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它會指定應用程式的執行個體和集合屬性設`MyApplication`。It specifies the application's instance and sets the property to `MyApplication`. ``` ```

exception.span: 嘗試將 設定為長度超過 256 個字元的字串。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呼叫類別來建立 ASP.NET 應用程式的組態檔 (Web.config) 中指定的授權管理員的資料存放區中的角色。The method is called by the class to create a role in the authorization-manager data store specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 角色名稱不區分大小寫。Role names are not case sensitive. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立新的角色，授權管理員原則存放區中。The following code example creates a new role in the authorization-manager policy store. 如需啟用角色管理的 Web.config 檔案的範例，請參閱。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/CS/createrolecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/VB/createrolevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呼叫類別以刪除角色，從 ASP.NET 應用程式的組態檔 (Web.config) 中指定的授權管理員原則存放區。The method is called by the class to delete a role from the authorization-manager policy store specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 刪除角色時，也會從原則存放區刪除與該角色相關聯的使用者清單。When a role is deleted, the list of users associated with that role is also deleted from the policy store. 不會影響資料庫中的使用者資訊。The user information in the database is not affected. 如果`throwOnPopulatedRole`已`true`則會擲回例外狀況，角色將不會刪除，如果所識別的角色`roleName`參數有一個或多個成員。If `throwOnPopulatedRole` is `true`, then an exception will be thrown and the role will not be deleted if the role identified by the `roleName` parameter has one or more members. 如果`throwOnPopulatedRole`是`false`，則無論是空白或不會刪除該角色。If `throwOnPopulatedRole` is `false`, then the role will be deleted whether it is empty or not. ## Examples 下列範例會從授權管理員原則存放區刪除角色。The following example deletes a role from the authorization-manager policy store. 如需啟用角色管理的 Web.config 檔案的範例，請參閱。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/CS/deleterolecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/VB/deleterolevb.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呼叫類別來擷取的 ASP.NET 應用程式的組態檔 (Web.config) 中指定的授權管理員原則存放區中的所有角色清單。The method is called by the class to retrieve a list of all the roles in the authorization-manager policy store specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用方法來取得應用程式的角色清單，並繫結至結果控制項。The following code example uses the method to get the list of roles for an application and bind the results to a control. 如需啟用角色管理的 Web.config 檔案的範例，請參閱。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . returns.span: 字串陣列，包含指定使用者所屬的所有角色名稱。

span.span: A string array containing the names of all the roles that the specified user is in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呼叫類別從 ASP.NET 應用程式的組態檔 (Web.config) 中指定的授權管理員原則存放區擷取一份指定的使用者角色。The method is called by the class to retrieve a list of a specified user's roles from the authorization-manager policy store specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用方法來擷取指定使用者角色的清單並將它們繫結控制項。The following code example uses the method to retrieve a list of roles for a specified user and binds them to a control. 如需啟用角色管理的 Web.config 檔案的範例，請參閱。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/CS/ViewRolescs.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/VB/ViewRolesvb.aspx#4)]

span.span: The instance is configured with a file-based policy store, and read access to the file is not allowed at the current trust level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呼叫類別來擷取與 ASP.NET 應用程式的組態檔 (Web.config) 中指定的授權管理員原則存放區中的指定角色相關聯的使用者清單。The method is called by the class to retrieve the list of users associated with the specified role in the authorization-manager policy store specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 方法只會傳回直接包含的使用者名稱中所指定的授權管理員角色`roleName`參數。The method only returns user names that are directly contained in the authorization-manager role specified by the `roleName` parameter. 基礎授權管理員所呼叫的 API方法不支援的群組擴充，因此將不會傳回包含巢狀的 NT 群組、 巢狀的授權管理員群組和 LDAP 查詢群組的使用者。The underlying authorization-manager API called by the method does not support group expansion, so users contained in nested NT groups, nested authorization-manager groups, and LDAP query groups will not be returned. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用方法來取得特定角色中的使用者清單，並繫結至結果控制項。The following code example uses the method to get a list of the users in a particular role and bind the results to a control. 如需啟用角色管理的 Web.config 檔案的範例，請參閱。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/CS/adduserstorolecs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/VB/adduserstorolevb.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呼叫類別和方法來判斷使用者是否為 ASP.NET 應用程式中指定的授權管理員資料存放區中的角色相關聯的屬性組態檔 (Web.config)。The method is called by the class and the method of the property to determine whether a user is associated with a role in the authorization-manager data store specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會以程式設計方式檢查登入的使用者是否在系統管理員角色中，然後才允許使用者檢視的使用者角色。The following code example programmatically checks to see whether the logged-on user is in the Administrators role before allowing the user to view user roles. 如需啟用角色管理的 Web.config 檔案的範例，請參閱。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . MemberSignature.Value: public string ScopeName { get; set; }
.property instance string ScopeName
Public Property ScopeName As String
public: property System::String ^ ScopeName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ScopeName : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定授權存放區的範圍名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the scope name for the authorization store.

value.span: 授權存放區的範圍名稱。

span.span: The scope name for the authorization store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可以使用設定`scopeName`中的提供者執行個體的組態屬性`providers`組態區段的區段。The property can be set using the `scopeName` configuration attribute for the provider instance in the `providers` section of the configuration section. > [!CAUTION] > 因為單一的預設角色提供者執行個體用來提供所要求的所有物件，您可以有多個要求同時執行，而且嘗試設定屬性值。Because a single default role provider instance is used for all of the requests served by an object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the property value. 屬性不是執行緒安全的多個寫入與變更屬性值可能會導致非預期的行為時有多個使用者的應用程式。The property is not thread safe for multiple writes, and changing the property value can result in unexpected behavior when there are multiple users of an application. 我們建議您避免撰寫程式碼，可讓使用者設定屬性除非必要，否則。We recommend that you avoid writing code that allows users to set the property unless you must. 應用程式的範例設定屬性可能需要管理多個應用程式的角色資料的系統管理應用程式。An example of an application where setting the property may be required is an administrative application that manages role data for multiple applications. 這類應用程式應該是單一使用者應用程式並不是 Web 應用程式。Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application.
